## Description {#details}

Canonical scalar induction phi of the vector loop.

Starting at the specified start value (either 0 or the resume value when vectorizing the epilogue loop). <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpwidencanonicalivrecipe">VPWidenCanonicalIVRecipe</a> represents the vector version of the canonical induction variable.

Definition at line 3236 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
